item.title: solstice and surrounding events
item.description:
preface #

Emily texted me a few days ago: it’s the earliest sunset of the year today! Funny I thought - solstice is not for another few weeks - which I promptly pointed out to her. Turns out those are distinct phenomena.

The day after we meet at a cafe. Both intending to be there at 530 and both arriving an hour early to get some quiet time. Have I had the chance to figure out why it is that the sunset happens before the solstice? Not yet. We attempt and earth model with a yarn - it is entirely insufficient. I place my hypotheses:
